parameters.age:
The age classification of the canes; 0 indicates a newly emerged cane,
1 indicates a one year old cane and 2 indicates a two year old cane.
parameters.y: The y coordinate of the position of the cane in the plot.
parameters.x: The x coordinate of the position of the cane in the plot.

description:
Description
The brambles data frame has 823 rows and 3 columns.
The location of living bramble canes in a 9m square plot was recorded.  
We take 9m to be the unit of distance so that the plot can be thought of
as a unit square. The bramble canes were also classified by their age.
title: Spatial Location of Bramble Canes
format: This data frame contains the following columns:
